did.abstract: This collection consists of two certificates dated 1821 and 1824 concerning Simon C. Garretson's rank in the 64th Regiment of the New York State Militia.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Mrs. Guy Du Val, 1944.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The two items in this collection are housed in one folder and have no particular arrangement.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Simon C. Garretson military appointments, 1977.406, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Minimally processed to the collection level. Rehoused and finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in October 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of two certificates appointing Simon C. Garretson (or Simeon C. Garrison) to the ranks of Ensign and Captain in the 64th Regiment of the New York State Militia. The first certificate, dated 1821, is signed by Governor DeWitt Clinton, while the second certificate, dated 1824, is signed by Governor Joseph C. Yates.
